title: Job Market Growth And High Demand For Tech Talent Drives Expansion For Vaco Technology In Los Angeles
text:
Vaco Los Angeles
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- To meet the increasing demand for hiring technology talent, Vaco Los Angeles , an award-winning project and search firm, has expanded its Vaco Technology team to add recruiting and client service managers to place expert talent in high-demand contracts and full-time positions. With consistently low rates of unemployment in the technology field, there is a significant, growing demand in Los Angeles for information technology professionals with a broad range of skills. Companies in the greater Los Angeles marketplace in particular have found challenges hiring qualified talent to fill all of the technology positions. Vaco Technology hired Melissa Thadani as senior recruiter, and Gloria Gutierrez and William Weiss as technical client services managers.
Vaco Technology has already achieved a 100 percent growth rate thus far this year over 2014 due to the large and growing demand for technology professionals for project-based, contract positions and full-time, permanent positions. Some of the most in-demand technology areas are application development, including SQL, .NET, Oracle, front-end and back-end development, and web development; and infrastructure management, including network engineering, network administration, project management, systems architecture and help desk support.
With over 20 years of experience in IT project management in addition to recruiting, Gloria offers a unique blend of job knowledge and insights to her clients as she places top IT talent. Will has an extensive background in talent sourcing and placement and client service management and helps corporate clients meet their business goals by providing the talent resources they need. Melissa brings over 10 years of experience as a technical recruiter in the Los Angeles area with a proven track record of helping companies across a wide range of industries secure the most talented IT professionals in the region.
"I'm so pleased to have Melissa, Gloria, and Will join our team. They've each built a tremendous reputation in the marketplace based on their expertise and experience, and they are a great addition to our team," said Devon Zopfi , senior partner, Vaco Technology. "Having the right technology professionals in place is critical for many organizations to meet their competitive goals, but many companies are struggling to find the talent they need. Vaco Technology excels at sourcing and placing top IT professionals, and as a result, we're experiencing tremendous growth as the demand for more technology professionals increases across all industries. We expanded our team to meet this demand, and Gloria, Will, and Melissa will be instrumental to our success."
Gloria, Melissa, and Will stated they chose to join Vaco for a variety of reasons, including the company's values of teamwork, service, and results; the entrepreneurial spirit that's embodied in the corporate culture; and that Vaco really felt like a family.
About Vaco Los Angeles
Vaco Los Angeles , LLC is an award-winning technology firm also specializing in disciplines of finance and accounting for interim and executive search. "Vaco" is derived from a Latin word meaning "to free yourself from a master." Vaco Los Angeles launched in 2006 and has been named #1 Best Place to Work in Los Angeles four times. Vaco Los Angeles has also received Gold Stevie Awards for Best Employer, Company of the Year and Fastest-Growing Company. Vaco Los Angeles is part of a nationwide network of Vaco companies that has been named to the Inc. 5000 list for the past eight years. Further information on Vaco Los Angeles can be found at www.vaco.com/los-angeles .
